author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Xuerong Bio-Technology says dividend payment date on April 23
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - Shanghai Xuerong Bio-Technology Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 1.2 yuan (before tax) per 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 9 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on April 20
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 23 and the dividend will be paid on April 23
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/DveuNw
